other_tests.findings: Gallbladder is inflamed, compatible with known gangrenous cholecystitis. Left-sided pneumobilia is consistent with recent ERCP. A calcified granuloma is noted at the right lung base. No obstructive features were noted in the gastrointestinal tract.
